00106   static void downcaseString_inplace(std::string& str) {
00107     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < str.size(); i++) {
00108       str[i] = (char)tolower(str[i]);
00109     }
00110   }
00114   static std::string downcaseString(const std::string& str_orig) {
00115     std::string str=str_orig;
00116     downcaseString_inplace(str);
00117     return str;
00118   }

00220   static void trimString(std::string& s, const char *whitespace  = " \r\n\t") {
00221     s = s.erase(s.find_last_not_of(whitespace)+1);
00222     s = s.erase(0,s.find_first_not_of(whitespace));
00223   }

00284   static void subChar(std::string &s, char from, char to) {
00285     std::string::size_type pos = 0;
00286     for(pos = 0; pos < s.size(); pos++) {
00287       if(s[pos] == from) {
00288         s[pos] = to;
00289       }
00290     }
00291   }

00306   static void removeChar(std::string &s, char character) {
00307     std::ostringstream buf;
00308     for (size_t i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
00309       if (s.at(i) != character) {
00310         buf << s.at(i);
00311       }
00312     }
00313     s = buf.str();
00314   }

00316   static bool is32Bit() {
00317     bool is32 = true;
00318     int nBytes = sizeof(size_t);
00319     if (nBytes == 4) {
00320       is32 = true;
00321     }
00322     else if (nBytes == 8) {
00323       is32 = false;
00324     }
00325 #ifdef _WIN64
00326     is32 = false;
00327 #endif
00328 #ifdef __LP64__
00329     is32 = false;
00330 #endif
00331     return is32;
00332   }

00418   static std::string escapeString(const std::string &s, char c, char escape='\\') {
00419     std::string e;
00420     e.reserve(s.size());
00421     for (size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
00422       if (s[i] == c || s[i] == escape) {
00423         e.push_back(escape);
00424       }
00425       e.push_back(s[i]);
00426     }
00427     return e;
00428   }
00429 
00430   static std::string deEscapeString(std::string &s, char escape='\\') {
00431     std::string e;
00432     e.reserve(s.size());
00433     for (size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
00434       if (s[i] == escape) {
00435         i++;
00436       }
00437       e.push_back(s[i]);
00438     }
00439     return e;
00440   }

00442   static std::wstring toWString( const std::string &src ) {
00443     std::wstring dst( src.length(), L' ');
00444     std::copy( src.begin(), src.end(), dst.begin());
00445     return dst;
00446   }
00447   static std::string toString( const std::wstring &src );

00449 private:
00450     class StaticMem {
00451         public:
00452             StaticMem() {
00453                 uint64_t freeRam = 0, totalRam = 0, swapAvail = 0, memAvail = 0;
00454                 Util::memInfo(freeRam, totalRam, swapAvail, memAvail, false);
00455                 m_MemFreeAtStart.push_back(memAvail);
00456             }
00457             uint64_t getMemFreeAtStart() {
00458                 return m_MemFreeAtStart[0];
00459             }
00460             uint64_t getMemFreeAtBlock() {
00461                 return m_MemFreeAtStart[m_MemFreeAtStart.size()-1];
00462             }
00463             void pushMemFreeAtStart(uint64_t mem) {
00464                 m_MemFreeAtStart.push_back(mem);
00465             }
00466             uint64_t popMemFreeAtStart() {
00467                 uint64_t mem = m_MemFreeAtStart[m_MemFreeAtStart.size()-1];
00468                 m_MemFreeAtStart.pop_back();
00469                 return mem;
00470             }
00471 
00472         private:
00473             std::vector<uint64_t> m_MemFreeAtStart;
00474     };
00475
